user.title: Enter credentials
user.description:
Enter your username and password for your Google account (leaving the token field blank). Please ensure you are using an app password; you can create one at https://myaccount.google.com/apppasswords.

Logging in with a username and password may fail with certain library versions. If this happens, you can login with your username and token that you have manually retrieved instead (leaving the password field blank).

select_lists.title: Select lists
select_lists.description: Select the lists you want to sync with Home Assistant.

reauth_confirm.title: Reauthenticate
reauth_confirm.description: The Google Keep Sync integration needs to re-authenticate your account
